title: Jewel in the Crown. V.3. a People in Crisis
brief_description: The troubled Indian nation is now gripped by fear and chaos. The British find themselves threatened on two fronts, by the vicious war with the Japanese and by the violent internal struggle to free India from British rule. The life of cocktail parties and military rule has been replaced by murder and rioting in the streets.
